website_summaries.verdict: Leave no stone unturned with this 21-piece kit. Perfect for home or travel, you can’t go wrong with this durable kit.
pros: Expansive 21-piece kit includes myriad of items that new parents might forget to buy individually
We love the spacious storage case, which makes this easy to travel with
Case is large enough to stow additional items in
cons: Case does not have any pockets inside to hold individual items

customer_reviews.title: Only good thing are nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap quality items. The thermometer is crap and takes forever to get a reading, which is usually inaccurate. The bulb syringe is crap and does not work at all. The medication syringe is crap and does not hold suction for crap. The pacifier medication dispenser is crap. The brush, nail files, and comb are fine because how could they not be? The only thing that is worth it are the nail clippers, which are really great. I have not used the teether elements, so I can't speak to those. I would give a HARD PASS if you're considering purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap!
customer_reviews.text: I've had to throw away almost everything in the kit! The syringe has no suction and fills with air (not what you want with a gassy baby!), the pacifier medicine dispenser leaks out both ends and didn't hold on to a drop of medicine, the bulb syringe is a joke, and the thermometers don't work. Just don't buy this. I've only gotten good use out of the hair brush.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality product. The items are cheaply made and 100% not worth it. I used the syringe to administer some vitamin drops mixed with some breast milk and noticed all of the ink staring to rub off. Thankfully I noticed it before my LO could get too much in her mouth but to say I’m not impressed is an understatement!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too thrilled
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't thrilled with everything in this kit. The nail trimmers and nail file are my favorites. However, the bulb to suction baby's nose and the thermometer don't work that good.
customer_reviews.author: Cassieb

customer_reviews.title: Only Half the Items are Usable
customer_reviews.text: The medicine pinky is hard to open and close especially with medicine in it, and it dispenses too quickly. We now just pour the medicine into a bottle nipple and have our baby suck on that. The nasal aspirator is so stiff in doesn't work. The medicine syringe leaks, I threw it away. The nail clippers work as well as any. I haven't tried the nail filers but they look too rough to use on tiny baby fingers. I also haven't tried both thermometers, but they look cheap. I like the brush, and the comb, and the gum stimulaters look like they will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, just a few issues
customer_reviews.text: This has everything I needed for my little one. The only issue was the medicine syringe was not air tight and leaked when I used it, but I have a couple from that came in the infants pain/fever reducer we bought, so no real issue there. The only other complaint I have is that there aren't any straps inside to secure everything, so it's all just kind of rattling around in the case. If it had the elastic or Velcro straps then I would have given 5 stars. Other than that it's lasted 6 months and a friend even got one for her baby because she liked that mine came with so much in it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Nail clippers keep breaking - hazard
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 3 months and the nail clippers keep falling apart, all the pieces popping out. They pop out really rapidly and nearly hit my eye. I can put it back together but it's not easy. It's fallen apart about every other time I've used it and I'm fed up so I'll just going to throw it away now. I haven't used anything else in the kit yet so 1 star overall.
customer_reviews.author: snappymouth

customer_reviews.title: Nice little care set
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice inexpensive care kit some of the stuff is a little cheap but honestly I bought this for only a couple things in it like the hair brush the nail clippers and the boogey sucker
customer_reviews.author: MommaF

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Why Charge More For Other Colors?
customer_reviews.text: Loaded with helpful tools and gadgets for baby. I'm a female, and I am not a huge fan of pink, but the pink was cheaper than the gender neutral green. Crazy concept. Anyway, the items look fairly sturdy and well-made. I priced similar kits in big box department stores, and they run a dollar to ten dollars more expensive in stores. This was a good online deal. No complaints, other than charging more for the non-pink one.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Did the job, but nothing really special
customer_reviews.text: Bought largely because both our thermometers died at the very start of the 2020 Corona virus pandemic and this was cheap and still in stock / eligible for prime. Can't comment on most of the features, I don't have children, and a lot of the tools are wasted on us, that said, the nail clippers came in handy (work great on cats), the digital thermometer works (though the lack of a beep is a bit annoying) and the forehead thermometer and syringe will probably be useful in the future. Nothing amazing, but it had what we needed for a decent price in a time of scarcity and long waits.
customer_reviews.author: Jaa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality, Items are Not Functional
customer_reviews.text: My 5 week old hasn’t used everything that comes in this but the items I have used have all been low quality and aren’t functional. The pump to remove buggers and excess saliva does not have enough suction. The nail clippers broke the first time I went to use them. Also, the hair brushes/combs don’t do anything for my baby’s long hair. I was very disappointed with the cheap quality of the said items.
customer_reviews.author: Bex Kaleido

customer_reviews.title: You might not use all items in this
customer_reviews.text: As a new mom, i read a lot of articles online and thought ok I need this kit! But guess what, i only used the thermometer and nail clipper. Really i ended up actually buying a forehead thermometer. Other items like a brush, teether, etc you will end up getting new ones. Even pacifier. Just dont spend it here. But The three stars are for the quality of the product. Its pretty good. No complaints there. <edit: update> I also use the tooth brush now that my son is a toddler. But I also did purchase other toothbrush for my son to hold. But since he is in learning phase, I just use this to brush him.
customer_reviews.author: Preethi Yellappa

customer_reviews.title: I use some items
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but not for a new born maybe a toddler the brush is not for newborn head the comb I use for my dog when he sheds that’s how hard and bulky it is .. the thermometer works but very very slowly which is tough to use on a fussy baby the pacifier is way to bulky with an unnecessary cap on the back of it I did like one teething toy that my son uses only recently he is 5 months and the nail cutter is super sharp sometimes it will fling apart when opening or closing it but easy to put back together
customer_reviews.author: Raja salar

customer_reviews.title: Yes you get a good price for all the items but does that really ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so unbelievably cheap. Yes you get a good price for all the items but does that really matter if they don’t work like they are suppose to. Not worth it at all
customer_reviews.author: daniel cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy keeps coming damaged
customer_reviews.text: 2 time getting this kit and the brush is damaged again. Dont bother
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great except for the nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: Both nail clippers fell apart fast. One of them even broke upon me opening for the first time to use them. Ignoring that though the rest of the grooming tools are great and worth dealing with the 2 broken items. I love the thermometer strip the most, the emry boards are a close second. Everything in this kit is extremely useful to have and it even comes with a card for the case to write down contact information and important info about your baby. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon cheek

customer_reviews.title: Nail Clippers Make it Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok. A lot of the items are cheaply made. The clippers are fantastic, so i would probably buy again just for them. Much better than the white round ones threat are sold individually in stores. The pacifier looks like it was made for a doll. **update** Added a star after realizing that the pacifier is for giving medicine. Durrr. Haven't tried it yet but i use the amazing clippers all the time. Everything else is pretty standard.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Allbee

customer_reviews.title: It’s also really poor material. Everything in it feels cheap and doesn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot of stuff in this set that you don’t really need. It’s also really poor material. Everything in it feels cheap and doesn’t work well.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Devji

customer_reviews.title: Products are kind of cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have a kit for my newborn that included a variety of items. The hair brush, syringe, and the clippers work nicely, but the rest of the items are kind of cheap. The suction bulb doesn't suck very well I ended up using the one from the hospital. I've tried using the thermometer several times but it doesn't seem to work. Haven't had a chance to try the other items yet so we shall see if they are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This kid has everything you need when taking care of your infant. I love that it comes with it either and the different toothbrush. And I also love that it has the different thermometers. It has everything that you wouldn't normally think that you need and it's nice that it is in a zipped container so I can throw it in my purse and bring it wherever we need to. It's good so we can have it on hand when it's needed most.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would need this for my first baby, I didn't need half the stuff. Only really used the bulb syringe, medication syringe, and brush. I ended up getting a nail care kit with small scissors, which works way better than the nail clippers on an infant. I also got a better thermometer, teething ring, and toothbrush. Not really worth it, especially after purchasing different items that were better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and funny gift. I'm sure he knows what he's doing ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift in a "Daddy Survival Kit" hopefully he can figure it out...lol. I put the pieces, along with a bunch of other baby stuff, in a tackle box that he can carry around anywhere with him. Instructions and all. Very cute and funny gift. I'm sure he knows what he's doing but it never hurts to give him a kit. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Products are of low quality. The cob and the brush are hard and won't be delicate on the babie's skin. The forehead thermometer is a paper strip. Teether is hard plastic and feels like will hurt babie's gums. The nasal aspirator didn't look very good either. If I hadn't returned I would use just a few items.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful Kit
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our newborn and it was a huge help to have all these hygiene products in one place. From dental care, to nail and hair care, this kit has you covered. I still have this 2 years later and using with my youngest son. One thing we are realizing as parents as you need great products that help make your life easier. During bath time, I found this extremely helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Golf Weekly

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.. almost.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my family moved and we misplaced a lot of our kids hygene products: nail clippers, medicine cups, hair brush. And we desperately needed a new bulb syringe. Everything in this kit is pretty decent and does what we need it to do, EXCEPT for the bulb syringe. It just doesn’t work as well as we need it to. You’d be better off buying this kit and picking up a higher quality bulb from the drug store. Little remedies makes a phenomenal bulb, and this one just doesn’t even compare.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Need few changes !
customer_reviews.text: The brush come smashed, I use it anyway and the bulb syringe didn't work for me , I consider the material very hard .
customer_reviews.author: Uruguayita

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting better quality. While the tools are welcomed and a big help when caring for a newborn-toddler I am not happy with the quality or the safety of the nail clippers, the medicine pacifier is huge! It would choke most newborns if they were to suck on it for the medicine. I don't recommend it for everyday use. I would have it as a back up just in case for the thermometer and forehead strip thermometer, the suction bulb for mucus removal and such.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Samiya

customer_reviews.title: Use everything except the nail clippers
customer_reviews.text: 100% recommend, this was essential for me to have when baby was brand new. It would pull me out of a bind immediately. From filing down nails, to checking her temperature. The only thing that I would not use would be the nail clipper. But the Simba baby nail scissors instead. I was clipping my baby’s nails once as carefully as I could and with a slightly miscalculation and tiny move from baby I cut a little bit of her skin. That was the first and last time I used the nail clippers.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the syringe
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a new little one. The syringe included is a total joke, doesn't work at all. The toothbrushes and hair brush are excellent. I love the nail clipper, especially the loop part for your finger. Be careful though, they are really sharp. Everything else works great. The plastic bag to hold everything makes it easy to keep it all in one place. The medicine pacifier is a neat idea, not sure any kid would actually use it though.
customer_reviews.author: LeyaRuth

customer_reviews.title: Good essential variety of items, easy storage, nail clipper did break after first use however.
customer_reviews.text: This has many products that a very helpful with a newborn or baby. I liked the variety. The presentation was ok, nothing too fancy. I had the nail clipper break the first time I used it so I wasn’t pleased about that. It is otherwise easy to use, store and would be considered gift able to me if the nail clipper didn’t break first use.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Declercq

customer_reviews.title: I love the things included in this kit
customer_reviews.text: I love the things included in this kit, have not yet been able to use them as our baby girl has not arrived yet - due in January. My only issue is that the kit doesn't have slots to hold everything in place unless you keep the plastic, which is super annoying. So everything is just tossed in.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wachtmeister

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for what you get
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how it is so difficult to get this item when it has so low quality. It just broke when I was unpacking it. It can be bad if clipper had broken while clipping baby's fragile nails. Vendor mentions to boil the parts 5 minutes but they just melt. How are we suppose to sterilize them then?
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: I use this all the time
customer_reviews.text: I use this kit every day at least. I have a four month old. We haven't used all the tools in it but some of them... It's easy to pack away for our overnight trips. The brushes and comb worked great while we were battling cradle cap! I would really recommend this to anyone whether it's for a shower gift or to buy for your own kid.
customer_reviews.author: B.R-W

customer_reviews.title: Useful but products made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: I like the products included in this baby health kit. My only complaint is that they seem to be cheap. The clippers broke after only one use. I was able to fix it, but they should have come apart in the first place. The forehead thermometer doesn’t seem to work that well either. I know they are not that reliable compared to a rectal or digital thermometer but it wasn’t even close. All in all, for the price I guess that is what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: $16 kit + $5 for another nose pump...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit. I was disappointed with the nose pump. It is really small. Everything else I’m this kit is of great use but that nose pump. The ball is to small to have the force needed to remove snot from s runny nose. I had to purchase a 3 inch nose pump on my own which cost me a measly $5 more. However the rest of the kit is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a newborn baby especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. I am sorry it has taken me so long to give feedback. I usually do not do this as it takes a lot of time to go through so many orders. I did not have any issues and my products arrived in a timely manner. I got what I paid for. Great product!!! It has everything one would need to take care of a newborn baby. I love the pink set. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Best nail clipper!
customer_reviews.text: Cute pack. The head thermometer doesn't work well at all, so that went into the garbage. The rest is fine, but the BEST thing in here are the nail clippers. I have several and these are my favorite. I'd buy it all over again for the clippers.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty good for the basics
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a standard nursery care kit, and we plan on purchasing another brand as well for extras to put in the diaper bag or as back up. That being said, this set is very nice and offers the basics in a complete set. Unsure of how well they work because our baby isn’t here yet, but the kit was clean and unbroken. We also really liked the emergency contact card that came with it to keep in the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra R.

customer_reviews.title: everything is just kind of rinky-dink and poor
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer broke on the first use, everything is just kind of rinky-dink and poor quality
customer_reviews.author: e.h.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Nicer than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I wasn't sure if I would like this set. It looked campy to me. I WAS WRONG. Once I opened it up and pulled out the many pieces, I knew this would be a mainstay in my home. We are going to be using this a lot. The bag even fit in my baby nail grinder (bought seperately), so all of the essentials are together! Yes! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Em S.

customer_reviews.title: Some of the items doesn't even work
customer_reviews.text: The Nasal Aspirator doesn't even work. It has absolutely no suction at all. The nail clipper is very dangerous. It cut my little one's finger twice and he was bleeding. I end up buying another pair of baby scissors. This kit is not very useful. Buy them all separately if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Shih

customer_reviews.title: Gum massager and nail clipper make this kit amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I brought this. I had it on my registry, but did not receive as a gift. My hubby and I then went through the registry and this was something that my hubby added to the cart. I'm so glad he did. Even just for the little nail clippers alone. But I've also used the comb, brush and nose bulb. In addition to the gun massager, which my daughter absolutely loves!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Has all the basics
customer_reviews.text: The doc said I needed to use a brush on my baby's scalp. I had gotten other sets as gifts but none had a brush and just a single baby brush was more expensive than this whole set. So I got the whole set and I'm quite happy with it. It had some other things that my other sets didn't have either like syringes and emery boards and the stick on thermometers. A good selection of basic tools. Good gift for a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Katielady125

customer_reviews.title: I really do not like this kit
customer_reviews.text: I really do not like this kit. It is not good quality and I bought it way before I had the baby. It is not adapted to baby. The pacifier that gives medecine is gone in the sterelizer and I could not open it anyway. I put some of those in my sterelizer they melted I was so disappointed I could not use them even once the only thing I use from this is the nail clipper. I would not advice anyone to buy this set. That is my opinion. That is one of my worse order in amazon so far.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's really not a great kit. Has a bunch of stuff but I didn't find much of it to work well. The thermometer is completely inaccurate, the nail clippers are dull and clumsy, the syringe is cheap plastic and gets stopped up, etc etc... The only thing I still use from this kit is the hair brush.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Bulky bag
customer_reviews.text: The nasal aspirator is completely useless unfortunately. And I think the bag is a lot larger than it needs to be which makes it bulky to travel with. If you wanted to add a bunch of things to the bag then it would be good but for just taking it as it is it will use up a lot of space in your diaper bag for no reason
customer_reviews.author: leena

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was totally against buying pink stuff for my baby girl and then decided that it was probably for the best and nothing was wrong with pink. The item arrived on time with everything in it. I will leave.a better review once she gets here in 11 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Essentialmom

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a registered baby shower present, so I cannot give an honest review. The parents chose it. From what I can see, without opening it. It looks to be a very nice gift. I know they will be satisfied with it. And if they are, then I sure am too...Thank You for the fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This kit is a great value!! All of the items seem to be of good quality. It would cost way more to purchase each item separately
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a great value!! There are a lot of things you do need and some you "might" need. It is good to have all of it on hand. All of the items seem to be of very good quality.I purchased this for my daughter before she had her baby in October. She has used a lot of the items. If you had to purchase these items separately you would spend quite a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Kjolseth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for any newborn, but be advised, if you give it to someone in a foreign country, the thermometer only reads in farenheit. I took one to a friend and they use celsius there. Everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: i received everything as described. this is a great first aid kit to have and even comes with a pacifier that dispenses medicine.
customer_reviews.author: itz_kereece

customer_reviews.title: It’s just okay...
customer_reviews.text: I like the brush, the thermometer and the suction bulb are garbage and basically unusable, everything else is just okay. Not really impressed with the quality, but to be expected for the price. I do like the case it is in, plenty of room to add additional pieces for a complete kit!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Grant

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friends baby shower. I like everything in it except the snot sucker bulb thingy, the rubber is too stiff to reinflate itself quickly enough to actually provide suction and it’s very small otherwise everything else seems fine
customer_reviews.author: arctic granola cruncher

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Some of the products were super useful. We use the brush and comb every day and we use the nose bulb a few times, but it didn't work great. The nail clippers didn't work at all, they were too dull and we never really found a need for anything else in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, some of the parts arent as high quality as other brands, but for the money awesome. Cute color and all the things you need. Carrying case is handy but one catchall so there is room for improvement in organization. All in all pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Baby Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have product for every diaper bag and a second for home. These safety kit has a thermometer, nail clippers, brush, teether, nail files, medicine dispenser, and many other must have products. The price is fantastic. The case is of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Everything is really hard plastic and cheap! Looks like it’s made for a doll
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about buying a kit with everything I needed all in one but this kit is sooooo cheap! The nasal bulb is hard plastic so you can’t even squeeze it easily the pacifier is garbage n hard plastic. The only decent things are the nail clippers, brush, and comb. Probably because they work well being hard plastic! I would honestly believe it if someone told me this kit was for a doll or something it’s that cheesy. There’s a few things I might use but overall I would have rather spent the money on a couple decent items I know I’ll use then a ton I won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good essential bag for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Everything inside the bag is great, all the essentials. I sanitized everything in hot water.. some of the plastic actually melted & warped which is my own fault but figured a quick cleaning would of been fine on most of these items. So don’t do that lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Some Helpful Pieces
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure that we'd actually use any of the pieces, but wanted an inexpensive kit around just to be safe. We ended up finding a few of the pieces to be super helpful! The nail clippers, brush, and comb in particular are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: M9772

customer_reviews.title: Seems more like a play set than useful tools for parent
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a new kit for my second daughter and was disappointed with the quality of most items inside. At first I wondered if maybe I bought a set meant for dolls because some items were low quality. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but mostly cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The only thing we still use from this kit is the hairbrush. Products inside the pouch are cheap. The thermometer didn’t work and the nose suction bulb was not flexible enough and was useless. I think the medicine pacifier would have been very useful except my daughter refused any pacifiers at all so I never got to try it
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Swob

customer_reviews.title: Great kit basically everything we will need for our son
customer_reviews.text: Great kit basically everything we will need for our son. The tools seem well made and aren't obnoxiously small. The case they come in also has plastic inserts that keep them all neatly separated. I really like this kit and for the price you really can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: steven ashley

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend, she said she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT kit!!
customer_reviews.text: This has so many items in it, it's amazing! I love the case and there's plenty of space in it for other nursery care items. I actually forgot I had this kit since I have 2 others that family members had got me but my daughter LOVES the teether in here and we've used the head thermometer plenty of times along with the brush and regular thermometer. You should definitely buy if you're looking for a good nursery kit.
customer_reviews.author: Loveonlineshopping

customer_reviews.title: Not everything is needed
customer_reviews.text: I got this before my son was born thinking I needed it. Turns out only thing I used was the nail files and digital thermometer. So far anyways. The only thing I know I will use in the future is the medication dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended-Happy Shopping
customer_reviews.text: Been using this since Oct 2019. My husband bought this in the terms of using it for our baby. Every single item in it was useful during travel or at home. We mostly use the infants nail cutter to cut his fingernails and toe nails. Safe and highly recommended. It could be given as a gift during baby showers.
customer_reviews.author: Baymax

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This had everything I could want all in one convenient little bag. It all seems to work well. The brush is super soft, the bulb syringe does it's job and the thermometer is accurate. The nail files don't work very well on little baby fingernails but honestly none of the files like them I've tried seem to. The clippers do just fine though.
customer_reviews.author: GimptafiedTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a great gift
customer_reviews.text: this is cute and perfect for gift giving at a baby shower. I thought everything in it is very useful for a new mother. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of five was because the pacifier that comes with it I don't care for. Other than that everything else is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted.
customer_reviews.text: This feels really cheap & i know the price isn’t high so my expectations were low but this disappointed me none the less. The thermometer sucks so bad. Takes like 2 mins total to get to the temperature & if you have an infant you know that they hate their armpits being messed with so this long temperature check is a no go! Will be purchasing a new more expensive set. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars if that was an option! Cheap crap, suitable for a doll, not a baby.Bought because it was the only way to find a thermometer. Guess what: there are 2 in this set and neither works. The rest of the items are laughable. Don’t waste your money. Can’t even donate to animal shelter it’s so useless!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norman D Kass

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. The thermometer takes a long time and doesn’t make a sound so you don’t know when it’s complete. Nail clipper wouldn't cut her nails. She’s a newborn how is that even possible. Most of these things I don’t even need so it’s a waste of money. Just get something of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dinaa

customer_reviews.title: Very resourceful nursery kit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to take to the hospital and when i received it i was impressed with the details of the kit. Every thing in the kit would be of use from the newborn stage up until my son is an infant. The colour is unisex and can easily fit any diaper bag.I tested all of the pieces and they all work like they are suppose too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah GTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest stuff ever
customer_reviews.text: Thermometer takes too long for a baby, teething ring is super hard and sharp (wont use that), syringe leaks and isnt sealed enough to use. Other Wise ok buy. Definitely shows its price. Walmart ones are better.
customer_reviews.author: Jayda Wise

customer_reviews.title: All the neccesities
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit for a first time mom. It has all the basic health needs like thermometers (digital and the kind you can lay on their forehead), gum massagers, and nail clippers. I really like the nail clippers as they come with a special gripper. Lots of great stuff in here along with emergency contact forms for when you leave your little one with a sitter.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Brison

customer_reviews.title: This is a weird thing to say, but I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a weird thing to say, but I thought the type of plastic this was made from would be different. It is very cheap, hard plastic, almost as if this should be sold for a child's babydoll rather than used daily for an actual baby. Still, the set was complete, arrived timely, and is cheaply priced, so I suppose you get what you invest.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Everything in One Place.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a baby shower gift, and the mom loved it--practical stuff instead of cute clothes baby will grow out of in a month. It was part of an ensemble for several of us to gift to a favorite barista.I especially liked that it had its own pouch to fit into the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Henley Babb

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in quality. All pieces seem cheap and very low quality. Aspirator not even remotely usable.
customer_reviews.author: MBL

customer_reviews.title: Comes in very cute bag that's perfect size for everything
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you see. Comes in very cute bag that's perfect size for everything. And everything inside works great so far :). Recommended. Also this was cheaper that what's sold in store.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this adorable and very useful set. With each child that I have had, I have ordered a set and the quality is always first rate. In the set are all the many useful things you will need for baby. I love the zippered pouch which is a must have. Having all the little odds and ends in a clear bag is essential for those late night needs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Much needed for the new mom
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom I needed well...everything. This is a great purchase for what you get and you can use all of the items at some point. Really glad I got this as a new mom. Great for a baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Carrick

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Every thing you need. Quality is not as good for all, I'm going to need to replace the fingernail clippers soon,but for the price and quantity of things definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything your baby will need
customer_reviews.text: This has everything that my baby has needed, he is 2 now and I still use it 2x a month at least! Best for the price, but did have a lot of extra stuff that hospital already gave us for free.
customer_reviews.author: AZReviewer

customer_reviews.title: While this kit has a lot of great products, when I received mine
customer_reviews.text: While this kit has a lot of great products, when I received mine, the thermometer was broken. The cap on the end that keeps the battery in and has the on/off button was broken. The thermometer does not work.This is pretty disapointing. The rest of the kit is in good working order though and everything else seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: AliDun

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I think I have purchased 3 of these! It has everything you need for baby and more! Very well made. As described by seller. You will not be disapointed if you purchase this kit for your furtur baby! :-) Can't wait for the arrival of my grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Manon Lucie Godbout

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed in the quality of the items and I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: This product appeared to have everything needed for baby. Was disappointed in the quality of the items and I don't plan on using most of them. However, I do really like the hair brush. It's has really fine brissles and is soft on baby's head.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture, and the quality it’s perfect. The storage case it’s a little big when you unpack everything but I love it because I can use it for other things or storage more care items for my baby and have it I only one case
customer_reviews.author: Stefany Rosario

customer_reviews.title: I'm still using everything! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I literally have used everything in here since the day my son was born! Shoot, I even used some of it for our daughter while I was still pregnant with our son. Great quality, still using to this day 7 months after he was born.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: I really like this
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, it has everything I need. Definitely will be purchasing another for my friend. Should have come in other colors though besides that its a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tan

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good baby care kit. I’ve gotten a new one for each of my 3 kids births. Has a lot of good stuff that is great to have for a newborn baby all in one set. :)
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyMurderface

customer_reviews.title: All you need and some more for baby
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this set. It had everything for such a low price. There were other sets but this on came fir baby unisex color. Love the color, teal. For baby’s grooming needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. Everything works and is in great condition. This is great for sticking in the diaper bag or in the nursery. It comes with everything it shows. Also it does technically come with 21 items because they count each individual nail file and case but it's more like 14. It's still a great deal! I wish I had this 7 yrs ago when my son was born so glad I have it for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby shower gift and overall newborn esentials
customer_reviews.text: Perfect baby shower gift and overall newborn esentials. I love that all these little items have their own case that way they don't get lost or scattered.
customer_reviews.author: MR ROBERT A BEECH

customer_reviews.title: Case is backwards.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of the products inside the case, but the case itself almost seems like it was made to open upside down. The clear side is on the bottom and the opaque side is what opens up.
customer_reviews.author: Riley A.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I got it for the suction thing. The suction thing has zero power behind it, too small for anything. But the brush and other things were nice. Nail clippers are still too big for an infant.. not the necessity pack I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Delgado

customer_reviews.title: The price is great and the construction of the items seem to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the variety of items that are included. Everything you could thing of for first time moms. The price is great and the construction of the items seem to be pretty good. A few of these things you will receive at the hospital such as the nose bulb, a pacifier...but there are too many other things in here worth the price such as the baby clippers, thermometer, medicine syringe, gum massager, and teething ring. Plus, everything comes in the little bag for easy transport and keeping things together and not all in the bottom of the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna

customer_reviews.title: Includes all the essentials - Products inside seem cheap
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like or hate this product. It contains I guess all the needed items for newborns, however, a lot of the things look to be very cheap. I will still use it and if something doesn’t work when my baby arrives I will just buy it individually.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Evans

customer_reviews.title: Has most of the required stuff..
customer_reviews.text: Has most of the items which are needed in a starter kit, though baby brush quality needs little more improvement in terms of softness and quality. so we end up buying a brush separately but overall a good product to have as you never know what will be needed at what time.
customer_reviews.author: Tanuj

customer_reviews.title: This is nice, but some of the peaces could be improved
customer_reviews.text: The clippers are too big for my baby, would only use on an older child, the suction toy is pretty stiff and is nearly impossible to clean, the thermometer works half of the time... idk.. i feel i should've spent a little more to get nicer components
customer_reviews.author: HOT-LLAMA-MOMMA

customer_reviews.title: Some items not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have not used all of the items in this set. I will say the bulb syringe was pretty much useless to me. I never was able to use it well compared to the one I got from the hospital, I believe it was too firm to squeeze well. The nail clippers broke the first time I tried to use them however you can put them back together and they work fine now. Thermometer works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Then nail clippers and hairbrush in this are especially good. It's nice to have a kit with one ...
customer_reviews.text: Then nail clippers and hairbrush in this are especially good. It's nice to have a kit with one of everything in it. My kids really loved the teething stick. I did not find the forehead thermometer to be useful but the standard thermometer is. The medicine dispensing tools are also very helpful
customer_reviews.author: BB

product_meta.title: Summer Complete Nursery Care Kit, Teal/White
product_meta.description:
Color:Teal/WhiteThe Complete Nursery Care Kit includes 21 grooming and health care items essential for any nursery. A durable storage case is included so parents can keep each item conveniently close at hand at home or on-the-go.

BRAND STORY
By Summer Infant
feature_bullets: Medicine Syringe and Pacifier Medicine Dispenser help parents measure and easily administer the proper dosage to baby
Nasal Aspirator relieves baby’s nasal congestion
Forehead Thermometer and Digital Thermometer for an easy, accurate temperature reading
Emergency Information Card for quick reference to doctor’s number
Nail Clippers and Emery Boards (5), just the right size for tiny, newborn fingers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars6,080 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
